aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-3358-310 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 05/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 06/03/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 08/03/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 10/03/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 13/03/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
